name: langlearn-tts
description: Text-to-speech for language learning — synthesize vocabulary, phrases, and bilingual pairs with ElevenLabs, AWS Polly, or OpenAI.
long_description:
Synthesize text to MP3 audio files for language learning. Supports single text, batch, bilingual pairs, and batch pairs with configurable voice, speed, and pause settings. ffmpeg is needed for pair synthesis and batch merge; single text synthesis works without it.

This extension requires one of three TTS providers: ElevenLabs (premium, 70+ languages), OpenAI (multilingual), or AWS Polly (28 languages). To use ElevenLabs or OpenAI, paste your API key below. To use AWS Polly, run `aws configure` in a terminal — no key is needed here.

elevenlabs_api_key.title: ElevenLabs API Key
elevenlabs_api_key.description: Get one at elevenlabs.io. Provider auto-detected when key is set.

openai_api_key.title: OpenAI API Key
openai_api_key.description: Get one at platform.openai.com. Provider auto-detected when key is set.

output_dir.title: Audio Output Directory
output_dir.description: Where synthesized MP3 files are saved

tools.name: synthesize
tools.description: Synthesize text to an MP3 audio file

tools.name: synthesize_batch
tools.description: Synthesize multiple texts to MP3 files, optionally merged

tools.name: synthesize_pair
tools.description: Synthesize a bilingual pair (e.g., English + German) with pause

tools.name: synthesize_pair_batch
tools.description: Synthesize a batch of bilingual pairs
